name: Security On-Demand
tagline: San Diego Managed Security Services Provider
description:
Security On-Demand is a visionary leader in the Managed Security Services Provider (MSSP) space.  
We think differently about cybersecurity and are leading the industry by implementing new security models to achieve advanced threat detection through human bio-immune defense models and machine learning approaches.
Security On-Demand has a keen focus on customer satisfaction and quality.  
Our customer focus is to put the missing "M" back into the "MSSP" relationship.
